summary: Resolved 3 conflicts: accepted origin/main's deletion of .claude-output.json (build artifact); resolved internal/watcher/watcher.go by choosing origin/main's EventType as uint32 with 4 constants (EventRead/Write/Create/Delete) required by platform-specific files; resolved internal/watcher/file_watcher.go by choosing origin/main's full FileWatcher implementation with Start/Stop/Events pattern that satisfies agent.Watcher.
strategyUsed: Chose origin/main for all three conflicts: HEAD's Watcher interface with Watch/Stop/Events returning <-chan FileEvent was incompatible with agent.Watcher and existing platform implementations; HEAD's EventType as string with only 2 constants was incompatible with file_watcher_linux.go and file_watcher_other.go which require EventCreate and EventDelete; origin/main's FileWatcher with goroutine lifecycle management is the correct implementation that tests and platform files depend on.
